name: South32 Limited
description: South32 Limited is a globally diversified mining and metals company, with operations and investments in Australia, Southern Africa, and South America. Established in 2015 as a spin-off from BHP Billiton, South32 focuses on producing essential resources such as aluminum, coal, copper, nickel, silver, lead, and zinc. The company is committed to sustainable mining practices and aims to create value for its shareholders, employees, and local communities while minimizing its environmental footprint. South32 operates several major mines, including the Worsley Alumina and Brazil Alumina operations, as well as coal mines in New South Wales and Queensland, Australia. With a strong emphasis on innovation and efficiency, South32 leverages advanced technologies to enhance production processes and ensure safety across its operations. The company is also dedicated to social responsibility, engaging with local communities to promote economic development and environmental stewardship. South32’s strategy is centered around organic growth, selective acquisitions, and maintaining a resilient balance sheet to navigate the cyclical nature of the mining industry. As a publicly traded company on the Australian Securities Exchange (ASX) and the Johannesburg Stock Exchange (JSE), South32 is focused on delivering sustainable shareholder returns while adhering to high standards of corporate governance.
